title: Relevance Ventures CEO on Investing
itunes:title: Relevance Ventures CEO on Investing
description:
Cameron Newton, Founder and CEO at Relevance Ventures, discusses VC investing outside of the typical areas of NYC and Silicon Valley.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
